extendedInfo.description: LEARN THE SECRETS OF TAKING YOUR OWN BLOOD PRESSURE IN THE COMFORT OF YOUR HOME TODAY!Did you know that there is definitely a better way to take and monitor your own blood pressure? How about doing it at home?The good news on stumbling upon this app is that, you are going to learn the secrets of taking proper blood pressure in the comfort of your home. While the doctors or nurses or the so-called 'professionals' took years to master the skills, you do not have to go through all the hassles.This guide is not going to make you a doctor. It is just a report that guides you through the process of taking proper blood pressure at home. Not only that, you will also learn the factors of reducing blood pressure, what equipments to prepare and how to monitor your blood pressure effectively.If you are sick of having the nurses or doctor nagged at you every time you pay them a visit, this app is definitely for you.
